title: Simple Timer in Overlay
body:
Display a clean session timer in the overlay.

- Show elapsed time since session start
- Position it in corner of video
- No logic or sync, just display time like `12:31`

Labels: `hud`, `core`, `priority:low`
Milestone: 1

title: YouTube Video Loader + Manual Playlist Picker
body:
Let the user load YouTube video URLs into the extension.

- Paste YouTube video or playlist URL
- Optional dropdown to pick mood/location
- Display confirmation: `Run in Tokyo at night`

Labels: `music`, `playlist`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 2

title: Hallucination Overlay Mode (CSS/WebGL filters)
body:
Add a simple canvas over the YouTube video.

- Apply effects: blur, hue shift, non-blinking glitch, heat shimmer
- Filters should be subtle and not obstruct viewing

Labels: `overlay`, `effects`, `priority:high`
Milestone: 3

title: Static Travel Route Tracker (Pre-set Distance)
body:
User picks a static travel route (e.g., Tokyo → Berlin → Chicago).

- Total miles hardcoded (e.g., 9,452 mi)
- Each session logs distance run based on input
- Display: `You’ve run 32.8 miles on your world tour`

Labels: `travel`, `distance`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 4

title: Post-Run Travel Log (Simple Text Entry)
body:
After each run, user adds a note or auto-text is generated.

- Store locally as JSON session history
- Example: `Ran through Berlin—felt strong. Fog everywhere.`

Labels: `log`, `session`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 5

title: Music BPM Selector (User Toggles or Vibe-Based)
body:
Let user pick a BPM range or mood.

- Load YouTube/Spotify playlist matching that energy
- Example: `User chooses 'High energy' and gets 160 BPM tracks`

Labels: `music`, `bpm`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 6

title: Auto-Switch YouTube Videos Mid-Run
body:
Change videos based on time or input.

- Switch to next city every X minutes
- Optional key to skip
- Example: `You just left Istanbul, now entering Zurich`

Labels: `playlist`, `automation`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 7

title: Basic Wearable Listener → Extension Bridge
body:
Use fake step server or WebSocket listener for pace.

- Input includes speed, steps, BPM
- Used internally (not displayed yet)
- Example: `You're running at 5.2 mph`

Labels: `bridge`, `wearable`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 8

title: Miles Traveled Based on Real-Time Pace
body:
Track actual distance during session.

- Calculate miles from current pace/speed
- Subtract from total travel route
- Display: `You're now 237 miles into your 9,452 mile journey`

Labels: `distance`, `logic`, `priority:high`
Milestone: 9

title: “Surprise Me” Daily Travel Mode Selector
body:
Pick 2–3 cities/videos automatically for today’s session.

- Weighted by vibe, length, and variety
- Example: `Today: Seoul → Coastal France → Foggy London`

Labels: `travel`, `mood`, `priority:high`
Milestone: 10

title: Music Tag Cache
body:
Store tagged songs in localStorage or JSON.

- Format: `{ 'Artist - Title': { intensity: 8, position: 'peak' } }`
- Auto-load tags when song repeats
- Overwrite when user re-tags

Labels: `music`, `tags`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 11

title: Real Shuffle
body:
Shuffle music playlist using real logic (Fisher-Yates).

- Grab all items from playlist
- Shuffle locally
- Play in randomized order

Labels: `music`, `shuffle`, `priority:medium`
Milestone: 12

title: Use Tags to Pace Hallucinations
body:
Match tag intensity/position to pacing logic.

- Tag: `build-up`, `peak`, `cooldown`
- Influence spawn speed and intensity

Labels: `logic`, `tags`, `overlay`, `priority:high`
Milestone: 13

title: Live Audio Analysis + Effect Sync (Optional)
body:
Analyze live system or tab audio to trigger effects.

- Use volume spikes or beat detection
- Trigger hallucinations during loud moments

Labels: `audio`, `sync`, `stretch-goal`, `priority:high`
Milestone: 14
